caption.p: Syntheses of tertiary nitrogen-bearing 2′-hydroxychalcones. Reaction conditions: (a) EDC, HOBt, R 1NH, CH 2Cl 2, 18 h, 28 °C (b) Dess-Martin periodinane, CH 2Cl 2, 18 h, 28 °C (c) 2′-hydroxyacetophenone, 50% aqueous NaOH, MeOH, 24 h, 28 °C (d) MOM-Cl, Et 3N, CH 2Cl 2, 4 h, 28 °C (e) 1 M HCl, MeOH, 2 h, 60 °C (f) 1-(2-chloroethyl)piperidine⋅HCl or 1-(2-chloroethyl)pyrrolidine⋅HCl, Cs 2CO 3, NaI, acetone, 24 h, 60 °C.
